name: Egotistical Ape
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by sending 1 Beast-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard. When this card is Special Summoned this way, you can activate 1 of these effects: â—? Increase the Level of this card by the Level of the Beast-Type monster. â—? Decrease the Level of this card by the Level of the Beast-Type monster.
